name: ext_R4_ImmunizationEvaluation
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ImmunizationEvaluation for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents ImmunizationEvaluation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImmunizationEvaluation|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: Describes a comparison of an immunization event against published recommendations to determine if the administration is "valid" in relation to those  recommendations.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
